discourse_list.title: \xf0\x9f\x9a\x80 Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #4: Real-world Finance Core Unit, RWF-001

content.content: 1279×720 623 KB    Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #4: Real-world Finance Core Unit, RWF-001 This time Sébastien Derivaux (@SebVentures) will be introducing the Real-world Finance Core Unit (RWF-001) and its accompanying proposals for budget and Facilitator onboarding. Here’s an extract from the Mandate for the RWF (formerly known as RWA, real-world assets) Core Unit:  The mandate of this Core Unit is to bring real-world finance concepts to MakerDAO; Those concepts encompass but are not limited to:  Investing in Real-World Assets (loans, bonds, structured finance, …) Yield curve implications in DeFi Accounting, solvency, and potential regulatory reporting   @juan will be the host   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-03-19T17:00:00Z  Where When the time is ripe, follow this Zoom link  Or use this information:  Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: COREUNIT One tap mobile +13017158592,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Washington DC) +13126266799,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Chicago) Dial by your location +1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC) +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago) +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston) +1 646 558 8656 US (New York) +1 669 900 9128 US (San Jose) +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: 46651499 Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom  attn: @davidutro, @flipflopflapdelegate, @malgaph, @_LS, @williamr,  @Prose11, @g_dip , @mrabino1, @planet_x, @hongbiao_li, @smaugho, @krzkaczor, @ejbarraza, @ultraschuppi, @Rich_Cuellar-Lopez, @mario, @aes, @pierreyvesg7
